properties.Name: Albion Spring
properties.Treatment Process: pH level adjustment (carbon dioxide scrubbing) and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Blackheath
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), odour control (powder activated carbon), flocculation (aluminium sulphate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Brooklands
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), flocculation (aluminium sulphate/sodium aluminate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection
properties.Water Source: Kleinplaats and Lewis Gay dams (augmented from the South African Navy�s Rawson dam)

properties.Name: Constantia Nek
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), flocculation (aluminium sulphate/ sodium aluminate/ sodium silicate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection
properties.Water Source: Alexandra, De Villiers and Victoria dams

properties.Name: Faure
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), odour control (powder activated carbon), flocculation (ferric sulphate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Helderberg
properties.Treatment Process: pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), slow sand filtration and chlorination and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Kloof Nek
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), flocculation (aluminium sulphate/sodium aluminate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Silwerstroom
properties.Treatment Process: Pressure sand filtration, pH level adjustment and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Steenbras
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), flocculation (aluminium sulphate/sodium aluminate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Vo�lvlei
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), odour control (powder activated carbon), flocculation (aluminium sulphate/polyelectrolyte), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection
properties.Water Source: Voelvlei Dam (Klein Berg and Twenty-four rivers)

properties.Name: Wemmershoek
properties.Treatment Process: Coagulation and pH level adjustment (hydrated lime), flocculation (aluminium sulphate), settlement, filtration, stabilisation (hydrated lime and carbon dioxide), and chlorine disinfection

properties.Name: Witzand
properties.Treatment Process: pH level adjustment (sodium hydroxide), ion-exchange softening and chlorine disinfection
properties.Water Source: pH level adjustment (sodium hydroxide), ion-exchange softening and chlorine disinfection
